R

react(List<Supplier<U>>) - Method in class com.aol.simple.react.SimpleReact
Start a reactive dataflow with a list of one-off-suppliers
react(Iterator<U>, int) - Method in class com.aol.simple.react.SimpleReact
Start a reactive flow from a JDK Iterator
react(Supplier<U>, Generator) - Method in class com.aol.simple.react.SimpleReact
Start a reactive dataflow from a single Supplier, which will be executed repeatedly according to rules defined by the generator.
react(Function<U, U>, ReactIterator<U>) - Method in class com.aol.simple.react.SimpleReact
Start a reactive dataflow that calls the supplied function iteratively, with each output, feeding into the next input Example :- List results = new SimpleReact() . react((input) -> input + 1,iterate(0).times(1).offset(10))
react(Supplier<U>...) - Method in class com.aol.simple.react.SimpleReact
Start a reactive dataflow with an array of one-off-suppliers
ReactIterator<T> - Interface in com.aol.simple.react.generators
 
reactToCollection(Collection<R>) - Method in class com.aol.simple.react.SimpleReact
Start a reactive flow from a Collection using an Iterator
